Name: Squashable bug on screen
UserPrompt: put a bug in a random spot on screen that requires the player to click it to squash it (play squash sound too!) (they can enable their cursor with tab so dont make it popup and take away control) (theres a 16x16 bug icon in gmod's files)
ExecutionCode:
RunOnClient([[
    local screenW, screenH = ScrW(), ScrH()
    local bugSize = 32
    local bugX = math.random(bugSize, screenW - bugSize)
    local bugY = math.random(bugSize, screenH - bugSize)
    
    -- Create bug panel
    local bugPanel = vgui.Create("DButton")
    bugPanel:SetSize(bugSize, bugSize)
    bugPanel:SetPos(bugX, bugY)
    bugPanel:SetText("")
    bugPanel:SetDrawBackground(false)
    bugPanel:SetCursor("hand")
    
    -- Paint bug icon
    function bugPanel:Paint(w, h)
        surface.SetDrawColor(255, 255, 255, 255)
        surface.SetMaterial(Material("materials/icon16/bug.png"))
        surface.DrawTexturedRect(0, 0, w, h)
    end
    
    -- Click handler
    function bugPanel:DoClick()
        local squashSounds = {
            "physics/flesh/flesh_squishy_impact_hard1.wav",
            "physics/flesh/flesh_squishy_impact_hard2.wav",
            "physics/flesh/flesh_squishy_impact_hard3.wav",
            "physics/flesh/flesh_squishy_impact_hard4.wav",
            "physics/flesh/fist_hit_01.wav",
            "physics/flesh/fist_hit_02.wav",
            "physics/flesh/fist_hit_03.wav"
        }
        local squashSound = squashSounds[math.random(#squashSounds)]
        surface.PlaySound(squashSound)
        self:Remove()
    end
    
    -- Store reference for potential cleanup
    _G.BugPanel = bugPanel
]])
UndoCode:
RunOnClient([[
    if _G.BugPanel and IsValid(_G.BugPanel) then
        _G.BugPanel:Remove()
    end
    _G.BugPanel = nil
]])
